2025
About Us
TETCO’s Story
Tatweer Education Technologies Company is a government company,
Tetco is one of the companies under Tatweer Educational Holding, which
was officially founded in 2016, in order to support the educational pro-
cess in carrying out the functions of educational technologies, providing
high-quality solutions and services for both the public and private sec-
tors, and developing technical services and communications in the field
of education in the Kingdom. To raise the level of this sector in order to
keep pace with future growth at the local and international levels.
3
TETCO.SA

pages.text:
2025
Cybersecurity
Awareness
14
TETCO.SA

2025
The accounts
It is considered an identity in cyberspace, and examples of it include:
Commercial platform and application accounts
Social and professional media accounts
Bank accounts
Email Accounts
15
TETCO.SA

2025
Why do we care?
Because if an attacker gains access to one of your accounts, he will be able to:
Conduct fraudulent transactions using the account
Access data stored in the account and reveal its secret and delete it
Impersonating your identity and communicating with your coworkers or relatives
16
TETCO.SA

2025
Identity Verification Methods
There a wide range of means of identity verification, examples of which include:
Secret code
One-time access code
Username and password
Fingerprint
Face print
Secret pattern
17
TETCO.SA

2025
Accounts Securities
A preventive measure. That helps protect you and those around you from cyber risks:
One-time access code
Username and password
Secret code
18
TETCO.SA

2025
Passwords
One of the most popular ways to secure accounts, and to make sure you choose it correctly, make sure to:
To be different from one account to another
To be a strong password
To be easy to remember, and difficult to guess
To consist of a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols
19
TETCO.SA

2025
Passwords
One of the most popular ways to secure accounts, and to make sure you choose it correctly, make sure to:
Share passwords with others
Reuse previous passwords
Use a single password for all accounts
Use personal phone data such as date of birth or number in passwords
20
TETCO.SA

2025
Accounts Securities
A preventive measure. That helps protect you and those around you from cyber risks:
Replace some letters with symbols or numbers
Use a specific sentence
Diversification in between Uppercase and lowercase letters
Example: 1WorkTheCyberSecurityF1eld
